### Exercise 3

Let $\mathbf{y} =  \left[ {\begin{array}{cc}
   y_1 \\
   y_2
  \end{array} } \right]$, 
  $\boldsymbol{\theta} =  \left[ {\begin{array}{cc}
   4 \\
   8
  \end{array} } \right]$, 
  $\Sigma =  \left[ {\begin{array}{cc}
   1 & .2 \\
   .2 & 1.3\\
  \end{array} } \right]$. 
  
  If $\mathbf{y} | \boldsymbol{\theta}, \Sigma \sim MVN(\boldsymbol{\theta}, \Sigma)$, then $y_1 \sim N(a, b)$. What is $a$ and $b$?
